name: Power of commissioner
text:
The commissioner may adopt rules pursuant to chapter 91, as amended, as the commissioner deems necessary for the administration of this chapter.  The rules shall include, but not be limited to the following:



	(1)	Advertising;
	(2)	Solicitation; and
	(3)	Specifications as to the forms and procedures to be used in the making of any mortgage loan. [L 1967, c 228, §7; HRS ; am L 1983, c 39, §7]
